translations: v.使具有政治性；搞政治（politicise 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Some of those involved may "ride the wave," and take advantage of those who are not politicised, seizing illegitimate opportunities.
sentences.translation: 有一些参与进来的人也许能够“驾驭住涛浪”，利用那些不懂策略的人，抓住非法取得的机会。
